analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying civil service employees who develop funding announcements and oversee grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in federally-funded science, and reduce our ability to identify future cures and treat existing illnesses.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the NIH and its impact on public trust and scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the rule.
